Add project treatment change

Source: R/fn_add.R
add_project_treatment_change.Rd

add_project_treatment_change() is an Add function that updates an object by adding new values to new or empty fields. Specifically, this function implements an algorithm to add project treatment change. The function returns Dataset (a tibble).

Usage

add_project_treatment_change(
  ds_tb,
  arrange_by_id_lgl = T,
  change_var_nm_1L_chr = "treatment_change",
  suffix_1L_chr = "_previous",
  timepoint_1L_chr = "MeasurementWeek",
  timepoint_bl_1L_chr = "Week0",
  uid_1L_chr = "UID",
  var_nm_1L_chr = "treatment_status",
  wide_1L_lgl = F
)

Arguments

ds_tb

Dataset (a tibble)

arrange_by_id_lgl

Arrange by identity (a logical vector), Default: T

change_var_nm_1L_chr

Change variable name (a character vector of length one), Default: 'treatment_change'

suffix_1L_chr

Suffix (a character vector of length one), Default: '_previous'

timepoint_1L_chr

Timepoint (a character vector of length one), Default: 'MeasurementWeek'

timepoint_bl_1L_chr

Timepoint baseline (a character vector of length one), Default: 'Week0'

uid_1L_chr

Unique identifier (a character vector of length one), Default: 'UID'

var_nm_1L_chr

Variable name (a character vector of length one), Default: 'treatment_status'

wide_1L_lgl

Wide (a logical vector of length one), Default: F

Value

Dataset (a tibble)
